amendatorysection.catchline: Shell eggs; sale below quality Grade B; unlawful; exception; applicability of section.
amendatorysection.para: (1) It shall be unlawful to sell shell eggs below the quality grade of Grade B at retail or to food purveyors except as provided in the packing tolerances for Grade B eggs established under the rules and regulations of the department.
(2) This section does not apply to any person exempt from comparable provisions of the federal Egg Products Inspection Act and 7 C.F.R. 57.100.
